description: Espresso shots topped with hot water create a light layer of crema culminating in this wonderfully rich cup with depth and nuance.
Lightly roasted coffee that's soft, mellow and flavorful. Easy-drinking on its own and delicious with milk, sugar or flavored with vanilla, caramel or hazelnut.
Our signature espresso and steamed milk with the celebrated flavor combination of pumpkin, cinnamon, nutmeg and clove. Enjoy it topped with whipped cream and real pumpkin-pie spices.
ingredients: Milk, Pumpkin Spice Sauce, Brewed Espresso, Whipped Cream, Pumpkin Spice Topping

description: Everything and more that you ever wanted in a sippable, dreamy holiday drink: Starbucks® Cold Brew swirled with Irish cream syrup, and topped with a cloud of vanilla sweet cream cold foam and a hint of cocoa.
ingredients: Ice, Brewed Coffee, Irish Cream Cold Foam, Irish Cream Syrup, Cocoa Powder Topping

description: Our signature espresso meets white chocolate sauce, milk and ice, and then is finished off with sweetened whipped cream to create this supreme white chocolate delight.
ingredients: Ice, Milk, White Chocolate Mocha Sauce, Brewed Espresso, Whipped Cream

description: Layered flavors of apple and brown sugar meld like the filling of a gooey apple pie in harmony with espresso, milk, ice and a caramelized-spiced apple drizzle—a nostalgic autumn pick-me-up.
ingredients: Milk, Ice, Brewed Espresso, Spiced Apple Drizzle, Apple Brown Sugar Syrup
